name: Zombie Battle Hero
description:
Let's sharpe your brain with play this addictive game! Assume you are battle hero and your job is kill all zombies. You need to solve all levels with your touch finger and use of your mind power. You need to move them and kill all zombie. This game uses your intelligence and ingenuity to play.

There are so many easy to hard levels. You need to completed every levels one by one and completed play this game.

Features:
=======
- Addicting game play.
- So many different easy to hard levels.
- Help to increase mind power.
- Adventure game play.
- Supported IOS11.

So are you ready for play? Download Now...
